paper_metadata.title: BRCA2 gene mutations in families with aggregations of breast and stomach cancers
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In families where the occurrence of breast and stomach cancers was among 1° relatives, BRCA2 abnormalities were detected in two out of 12 cases (one frameshift, one assumed missense variation; 16.7%).

functional_data.summary: Frameshift mutation likely disrupts protein function.

variants.additional_notes: Identified in a family with breast cancer.
key_quotes: In families where the occurrence of breast and stomach cancers was among 1° relatives, BRCA2 abnormalities were detected in two out of 12 cases.
